humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 3.5 x 2 x 2 cm. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The tumor size of the invasive carcinoma is reported as 3.5 x 2 x 2 cm (gross tumor size: 3.5 x 2 x 2 cm, size of invasive component: 3.5 X 2 x 2 CM). The T stage is determined by the greatest dimension of the primary tumor. According to the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) staging guidelines, T2 stage corresponds to a primary tumor size of 2.0 to 5.0 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
